casebody.data:
COUNTY OF CABARRUS, et al.
v.
TOLSON. No. 329P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. R. Daniel Boyce, Philip R. Isely, Raleigh, for County of Cabarrus, et al. Grayson G. Kelly, Chief Deputy Attorney General, John F. Maddrey, Norma S. Harrell, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for Secretary of Revenue.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of May 2005 by Plaintiffs to Amend Petition for Discretionary Review and Alternative Petition for Discretionary Review of Constitutional Issues:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
